title: Hand
provenance_text:
Bushirô Môri [1923-2004], Tokyo, Japan; Kusuo Shimizu, The Minami Gallery, Tokyo, Japan [2]; purchased by Department of Fine Arts, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, October 1961.

Notes:
[1]. The sculpture was included (no. 272, illustrated in the catalogue) in "The 1961 Pittsburgh International Exhibition of Contemporary Painting and Sculpture" held at Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, October 1961 - January 1962. It was lent by Kusuo Shimizu, Director, The Minami Gallery.
[2]. The sculpture was purchased by Carnegie Institute from the International. It was accessioned on October 17, 1961. Payment was made with a check dated November 14, 1961 and sent on November 17, 1961.
